text:
Private nonprofit institutions providing residential care for unwed
mothers are not covered by the enterprise provisions of the FLSA. provided that
the maternity home is not operated in conjunction with a hospital, covered
institution, or school within the meaning of Secs 3(r) and 3(s) of the Act.
There may be employees covered on an “individual” basis, however.
html: Private nonprofit institutions providing residential care for unwed mothers are not covered by the enterprise provisions of the FLSA. provided that the maternity home is not operated in conjunction with a hospital, covered institution, or school within the meaning of Secs 3(r) and 3(s) of the Act. There may be employees covered on an “individual” basis, however.
